short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the text 'Phoenix Wright' with 'Up My Bum' to annoy Jon Venn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
While installed, this will replace any instance of the phrase "Phoenix Wright" with "Up My Bum".

You probably shouldn't install it, to be honest.
